Class Nucleus

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.nuclear.Nucleus
public class Nucleus extends Object
Represents an atomic nucleus with proton/neutron counts. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot

  • Method Details

    • getMassNumber

      public int getMassNumber()
      Mass number: A = Z + N

    • getNuclearRadius

      public Real getNuclearRadius()
      Approximate nuclear radius: $R = r_0 A^{1/3}$ where $r_0 \approx 1.2$ fm.

    • getBindingEnergy

      public Real getBindingEnergy()
      Semi-empirical binding energy (Weizsäcker formula). $B = a_V A - a_S A^{2/3} - a_C Z(Z-1)/A^{1/3} - a_A (N-Z)^2/A + \delta$

    • getBindingEnergyPerNucleon

      public Real getBindingEnergyPerNucleon()
      Binding energy per nucleon: B/A in MeV.
